basic.description: This course provides an advanced study in specific topics and theories relating to the fields of sexual and gender diversity. Topics may change from year to year. This course contains an intensive and independent study component.
basic.subject: GNDS
basic.title: Seminar in Sexual and Gender Diversity

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of Level 3 or above in GNDS or SXGD plan, or permission of the department.
